articles.author: RNZ News
articles.title: Omicron and Delta driving a tsunami of Covid-19 cases, WHO says - RNZ
articles.description: The warning comes as record cases of Covid-19 are once again reported across the US and Europe.
articles.content:
The combination of Delta and Omicron variants is driving a dangerous tsunami of Covid-19 cases, the World Health Organisation (WHO) chief says.
